name: Stadium Bar
description: The Stadium Bar at the Eldorado brings a premium sports viewing experience to Reno's Row complex. Featuring a massive LED video wall, individual viewing stations, and a comprehensive sports betting menu, it's designed for the serious sports fan. Combined with craft beers, cocktails, and elevated bar food, it's the ultimate game-day destination.
shortDescription: Premium sports viewing with massive LED wall and sports betting at the Eldorado.

faqs.question: What makes Stadium Bar different from a regular sports bar?
faqs.answer: Premium LED video wall, individual viewing stations, and integrated sports betting for a complete game-day experience.

faqs.question: Is it part of The Row?
faqs.answer: Yes, located in the Eldorado which connects to Silver Legacy and Circus Circus via skywalks.

faqs.question: Do they have sports betting?
faqs.answer: Yes, a comprehensive sports betting menu is integrated into the bar experience.

meta.title: Stadium Bar at Eldorado – Sports & Betting Reno | Golf The High Sierra
meta.description: Experience premium sports viewing and betting at Eldorado's Stadium Bar. Massive LED wall and craft beers on The Row.

testimonials.quote: Stadium Bar has become our go-to after-golf hangout. Cold beers, good energy, and it's right inside eldorado-resorts-reno-eldorado-at-the-row. GTHS knows all the best spots.
testimonials.author: Jeff P.

testimonials.quote: Post-round drinks at Stadium Bar are a must. Our whole group gathered here after 18 holes and the vibe was perfect. Good cocktails, sports on the TVs, and the staff handled our large tab easily.
testimonials.author: Ryan P.
